Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from class aima.core.agent.impl.AbstractAgent
program
 
Constructor Summary
GameAgent(Game<MOVE> g)
          Constructs a game agent with the specified game to play.
 
Method Summary
 void makeAlphaBetaMove()
          Causes the game agent to make a move from an alpha beta search, which does the same computation as a normal minimax, but also prunes the search tree.
 void makeMiniMaxMove()
          Causes the game agent to make a move from the minimax decision, which maximizes the utility under the assumption that the opponent will play perfectly to minimize it.

execute, isAlive, setAlive

Constructor Detail

GameAgent

public GameAgent(Game<MOVE> g)
Constructs a game agent with the specified game to play.

Parameters:
g - a game for the game agent to play.
Method Detail

makeMiniMaxMove

public void makeMiniMaxMove()
Causes the game agent to make a move from the minimax decision, which maximizes the utility under the assumption that the opponent will play perfectly to minimize it.

makeAlphaBetaMove

public void makeAlphaBetaMove()
Causes the game agent to make a move from an alpha beta search, which does the same computation as a normal minimax, but also prunes the search tree.
